characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Consistently appears as direct and to-the-point in their responses.

options.description: Agent responds quickly, without nuance or explanation.
Agent takes time to consider and respond thoughtfully.

characteristics.name: Investing Knowledge
characteristics.description: Demonstrates in-depth understanding of investing concepts and markets.

options.description: Agent provides expert-level advice and insights.
Agent demonstrates a solid foundation, but may require guidance.

characteristics.name: Writing Style
characteristics.description: Produces clear, concise writing with minimal errors.

options.description: Agent writes with precision and brevity.
Agent tends to write extensively, sometimes redundantly.

characteristics.name: Personality Tone
characteristics.description: Consistently exhibits a friendly, approachable tone.

options.description: Agent is warm and welcoming in their interactions.
Agent maintains a professional, neutral demeanor.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Effectively navigates complex social situations with ease.

options.description: Agent is self-assured and assertive in group settings.
Agent tends to be more reserved, preferring one-on-one interactions.

characteristics.name: Values Alignment
characteristics.description: Consistently prioritizes values related to fairness and transparency.

options.description: Agent strives for balance and equality in their decisions.
Agent maintains a strict adherence to their personal values.

characteristics.name: Investment Strategy
characteristics.description: Recommendations align with a long-term, risk-managed approach.

options.description: Agent is willing to take calculated risks for potential gains.

characteristics.name: Digital Literacy
characteristics.description: Demonstrates proficiency in various digital tools and platforms.

options.description: Agent expertly utilizes advanced features and software.
Agent demonstrates basic familiarity with common digital tools.
